skillTree.localised_description: A lucky prey from a skirmish against Corsairs, this rare magical repeater crossbow is too cumbersome for use on foot, but if you want something positively dead, it's a nice toy. Just have to hope the magic in it isn't too dark.

attributes.bullet_text: This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.
This unit can hide in forests until enemy units get too close.
This unit can fire while on the move.

ui_effects.localised_text: Will spot most invisible units within 200m

skillTree.localised_description: About as potent as orange juice to the Lizardmen, this precious lustrian wine is strong indeed for a human!
The Goddess of Battle protects Her own.
Costly gear lent to the mercenary companies may be expensive, but it may save the day and the treasury afterwards.
Fine troops, personally drilled by Colombo, tend to become a devastating force on the battlefield.

effects.description:
Ammunition: +10% for missile infantry units
	(Lord's army)

Missile strength: +10% for missile infantry units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: Colombo's fame, and his army's, is growing. Even the most fearsome bandits and raiders tend to shuffle their feet upon learning they have become a target for Colombo's mercenaries.

effects.description:
Leadership: +5 when fighting against Rogue Armies
	(Lord's army)

Attribute: Causes Fear when fighting against Rogue Armies
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: Until he is usurped, for these things tend to happen in Tilea and especially in Trantio, Colombo is still prince, with friends over there. Armoured friends.

effects.description:
Recruit rank: +3 for Crossbowmen, Pavise Crossbowmen and Noble Retinue
	(all armies factionwide)

skillTree.localised_description: Mercenary hosts usually include powerful regiments with double pay and double the risks, once dubbed in Tilea "Duplicarii". The original meaning has gone lost, and the usual sense is now "You bunch of dog-botherers will better get it done, with what you cost me."

target_if: Unit is not Lord or Hero

attributes.bullet_text: This unit does not suffer any form of leadership loss and will never rout.
This unit's vigour is less affected by fatiguing actions, such as combat.

skillTree.localised_description: Having learned much in their long years of service, this character now turns their attention to training others.

effects.description: Character will share +15% of experience earned between all other active Lords

Character experience gain: +20%
	(Heroes in Lord's army)
Character will share +30% of experience earned between all other active Lords

Character experience gain: +35%
	(Heroes in Lord's army)
Character will share +50% of experience earned between all other active Lords

Character experience gain: +50%
	(Heroes in Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: Making friends with Skink interpreters isn't easy, but the more contacts you have, the more you understand each other, the more business can be done.
"Yes, I can see that is a Minotaur skull, my day hasn't improved one bit."

effects.description:
Leadership: +8 when fighting against Beastmen
	(Lord's army)

Weapon strength: +8% when fighting against Beastmen
	(Lord's army)

Missile strength: +8% when fighting against Beastmen
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: "That's a rat, right? Yes, that's a rat. I was worried you'd say that."

effects.description:
Melee attack: +5 when fighting against Skaven
	(Lord's army)

Weapon strength: +10% when fighting against Skaven
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: "It's Corsairs again, boys. Say your prayers and remember they run faster than you do."

effects.description:
Leadership: +5 when fighting against Dark Elves
	(Lord's army)

Melee defence: +5 when fighting against Dark Elves
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: "That's a pretty good impression of an orc, alright. We can do that, pal, just show us where they are."

effects.description:
Leadership: +3 when fighting against Greenskins
	(Lord's army)

Attribute: Causes Fear when fighting against Greenskins
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: "Franco, I know you have only the one arm left, but if they say there are Chaos fellas around here it's everybody's problem, alright?"

effects.description: Leadership aura size: +10% when fighting against Warriors of Chaos

Weapon strength: +10% when fighting against Warriors of Chaos and Norsca
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: "A skull. Walks like a drunk. Bites. Huinipachutli, mate, unless you're mimicking Giovanni I know what you mean."

effects.description:
Leadership: +5 when fighting against Vampire Counts, Vampire Coast and Tomb Kings
	(Lord's army)

Double experience gain for units when fighting against Vampire Coast
	(Lord's army)

Attribute: Cause Fear when fighting against Undead
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: Skink Priests like their prophetic mumbo-jumbo, but their needs are just as businesslike as anybody else's. And they pay in pearls as big as their eyes.

effects.description:
Attrition: -50% casualties suffered from swamp attrition
	(armies in local province)

skillTree.localised_description: Managing to get an audience with an actual Slann is a big honour, to actually get them to notice you in those big fat plans of theirs is... a triumph.

effects.description:
Army ability: "Holy Stela"
	(armies in local province)

skillTree.localised_description: Surprisingly, the local Slanns and Chiefs seem legitimately friendly now towards Colombo's expedition. There is a lot to learn just by being shown around their cities.

effects.description:
Bonus vs. Large: +5 when fighting against Lizardmen
	(all armies factionwide)

Melee defence: +5 when fighting against Lizardmen
	(all armies factionwide)

Hero recruit rank: +2 for Battle Wizards
	(all provinces)

skillTree.localised_description: Full-Plate armour protects the wearer from head-to-foot. Many such suits are blessed or imbued with arcane abilities.
The iron will and indomitable presence of this leader ensures their followers remain steadfast when facing peril.
The forest teaches a warrior not only when to fire but where, which makes a bigger difference.
The scars on this storied warrior reveal a veteran of many battles, a being not easy to kill and one worthy of respect and fear.
This warrior is one with their blade; it is an extension of their will, making them a worthy foe in combat.
Nook and fire. Nook again, and fire. Nook a third time, and fire. All in a heartbeat.
Kill many and you *are* a conqueror; godhood is then but a protracted slaughter away...
A blade that sings in defence will not let its wielder be penetrated.
Full-Plate armour protects the wearer from head-to-foot. Many such suits are blessed or imbued with arcane abilities.
There are Lords that radiate power, confidence and fear, inspiring their followers to great or terrible acts.

effects.description:
Unit experience gain per turn: +75
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: Well, this is straightforward enough.

effects.description:
Melee defence: +2 for spear, pike, halberd, lance and great weapon units
	(Lord's army)

Melee attack: +2 for hand weapon and dual wield units
	(Lord's army)

Melee defence: +4 for spear, pike, halberd, lance and great weapon units
	(Lord's army)

Melee attack: +4 for hand weapon and dual wield units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: Oh wait, there's another chapter.

effects.description:
Melee attack: +2 for spear, pike, halberd, lance and great weapon units
	(Lord's army)

Melee defence: +2 for hand weapon and dual wield units
	(Lord's army)

Melee attack: +4 for spear, pike, halberd, lance and great weapon units
	(Lord's army)

Melee defence: +4 for hand weapon and dual wield units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: Even the lousiest commander knows that you need two halves of a pair of scissors.

effects.description:
Leadership: +2 for hand weapon, pike and halberd units
	(Lord's army)

Charge bonus: +3 for spear, lance and great weapon units
	(Lord's army)

Leadership: +4 for hand weapon, pike and halberd units
	(Lord's army)

Charge bonus: +6 for spear, lance and great weapon units
	(Lord's army)

Leadership: +6 for hand weapon, pike and halberd units
	(Lord's army)

Charge bonus: +10 for spear, lance and great weapon units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: Duck! Shoot! Duck! Shoot! Shoot- shoot, that was wrong.

effects.description:
Missile resistance: +3% for all melee units
	(Lord's army)

Missile resistance: +6% for all melee units
	(Lord's army)

Missile resistance: +10% for all melee units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: The key is not letting your initiative depend on a lucky die.
It's seldom enough to have only some of your troops to be ready to take a beating. The enemy has their own plans.

effects.description:
Weapon strength: +3% for spear, pike, halberd and lance units
	(Lord's army)

Armour: +3 for great weapon, hand weapon and dual wield units
	(Lord's army)

Weapon strength: +6% for spear, pike, halberd and lance units
	(Lord's army)

Armour: +6 for great weapon, hand weapon and dual wield units
	(Lord's army)

Weapon strength: +10% for spear, pike, halberd and lance units
	(Lord's army)

Armour: +10 for great weapon, hand weapon and dual wield units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: "You kill them before they kill you, sonnie. That's all it is."

effects.description:
Melee attack: +1% per experience rank for all units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: "Though of course, if they do stab you, you better know how to parry."

effects.description:
Melee defence: +1% per experience rank for all units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: "Plus, you better kill them dead with the one shot you have."

effects.description:
Weapon strength: +1% per experience rank for all units
	(Lord's army)

Reload time reduction: +1% per experience rank for all units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: "And to do that, it helps if you put all your weight where it counts."

effects.description:
Charge bonus: +2% per experience rank for all units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: "Look, at the end of the day, you may be alive and you better learn from what didn't kill you."

effects.description:
Physical resistance: +1% per experience rank for all units
	(Lord's army)

Ammunition: +1% per experience rank for all units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: Those who know the land and its secrets will travel faster and further than the foes who don't.
This man can easily distinguish between an ancient elven magical sword of implacable might and a piece of shiny iron, which is not so simple when the artifact itself is in that disguise.
Sometimes it is just time to party. The louder, the better.
Proficient with figures, this Lord, or his subordinates, can keep his army fulfilled, even in dire circumstances.
"You know you're doing it right when everyone and their mamas are sending people to stab you."
"I shall wear midnight... and many knives."

effects.description: Enables lightning strike battles when reinforcements are present

skillTree.localised_description: Commerce is the life-blood of any economy, and the sea must be its heart.

"Open the coffers, put up more signs. I want more cannons, pikes, even ogres, even those buggers with the paper wings. Everyone. I shall have that castle by tomorrow or by Myrmidia I will drown them in mercs."
Kill not, waste not.
Such is the pinnacle of the tilean merchant prince and politician that seemingly anything can be handled.

attributes.bullet_text: This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.
This unit can hide in forests until enemy units get too close.

ui_effects.localised_text: Will spot most invisible units within 200m

factionEffects.localised_description: Led by the best navigator in the Southern Realms, Colombo's men will savour the New World virtually unimpended, potentially with the unique friendship of the local Lizardmen.

effects.description: Hardened Veterans: Strong Vigour, +5 Armour, +8%% Damage for all units (Rank 7 and above)
Diplomatic relations: -20 with the Huntsmarshal's Expedition
Recruitment cost: +25% for all units outside of coastal regions
Double experience gain for units when fighting against Rogue Armies

Attrition: -80% casualties suffered from high seas attrition
	(Lord's army)
Leadership: +10 when fighting against Rogue Armies

items.colour_text: A reward from the Slann, this amulet in the shape of Sotek's tongue feels oddly alive and protected the wearer more times than he recalls.
Used by someone to write an otherwise uninteresting map, this scroll bears potent enchantments of Nehekharan protective magic. However, it tends to crumble a bit with each use.

effects.description:
Enemy Winds of Magic power reserve change: -15% when increasing
	(local region)

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Marco Colombo is famous for having 'discovered' the New World, and for being one of the very few to have peaceful dealings with the Lizardmen.
A reward from the Slann, this amulet in the shape of Sotek's tongue feels oddly alive and protected the wearer more times than he recalls.
Used by someone to write an otherwise uninteresting map, this scroll bears potent enchantments of Nehekharan protective magic. However, it tends to crumble a bit with each use.

effects.description:
Enemy Winds of Magic power reserve change: -15% when increasing
	(local region)
